reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: TMEA TradeMark East Africa - support to economic integration of East Africa Community

description.narrative: TradeMark East Africa (TMEA) works closely with East African Community (EAC) institutions national governments the private sector and civil society organisations to increase trade by unlocking economic potential through: Increased physical access to market s Enhanced trade environment and Improved business competitiveness. In East Africa economic development creates opportunities for further trade and investements but infrastructure and logistics remain a bottleneck for expedited development. For instance tr ansportation costs are about 60-70 % more than inside the EU. Finnish support which is non-earmarked genera support to TMEA has been at 6 million euros during the last phase of the programme. Current support stretches to years 2017-2020 and will be approx imately 9.8 million euros. In the earlier phase of the programme TMEA has achieved significant results for instance in reduction of average time of goods through ports improving the conditions of women's border trade and enhancing trade environment through more effective us of legislation.
